name: Whitestone Fund Corp.
desc:
Whitestone Fund Corp. is a merchant cash advance and business lending company founded in 2010, headquartered in Yonkers, NY. The company provides quick, convenient, and flexible business loans ranging from $5,000 to $1,000,000 (with cash advances up to $1,500,000), tailored primarily for small and medium-sized businesses. They boast a 95% acceptance rate and offer durations from 6 to 36 months. To qualify, businesses must be at least 6 months old, generate a minimum of $20,000 per month, and have a minimum credit score of 500.

Led by CEO Adelso Leonaldo, the company has served small business owners for over 14 years and specializes in merchant cash advances, credit card processing, and business sales strategy. The company maintains a BBB Business Profile and has multiple web presences including whitestonefund.com and whitestonecash.com. Pre-qualification notifications are provided within 3 to 5 hours of application.

leaders.bg: CEO of Whitestone Fund Corp. with extensive experience in merchant cash advance, credit card processing, and business sales strategy. Has led the company since its founding in 2010, growing it into a small business lending operation serving businesses across the US with a 95% acceptance rate.
hooks: Your 95% acceptance rate is impressive — how do you manage risk at that approval volume?
Having been in the MCA space since 2010, you've seen the full evolution of the industry
Your flexible loan range of $5K to $1.5M covers a wide spectrum of business needs

news.h: Whitestone Fund Corp. Maintains Active BBB Business Profile
news.d: Whitestone Fund Corp. continues to maintain its Better Business Bureau accreditation as a commercial loans provider based in Yonkers, NY.

news.h: Whitestone Fund Expands Online Application Process
news.d: The company has streamlined its application process through apps.whitestonefund.com, offering pre-qualification notifications within 3 to 5 hours.

ice: Whitestone Fund's 14+ years in the MCA space and 95% acceptance rate show a strong commitment to serving small businesses that traditional banks often overlook.
icebreakers: Your longevity since 2010 in the MCA industry speaks to a sustainable business model — how are you thinking about the next phase of growth?
With a 95% acceptance rate and loans up to $1.5M, your underwriting approach must be highly refined after 14+ years
The fast pre-qualification within 3-5 hours is competitive — are you looking at ways to make that even faster with technology?
Having served small businesses through multiple economic cycles since 2010, you've built deep market understanding
tp: HyperVerge's AI underwriting could help Whitestone Fund maintain its industry-leading 95% acceptance rate while better managing default risk across its $5K-$1.5M loan portfolio
With pre-qualification already happening in 3-5 hours, AI-powered document verification could reduce that to minutes, improving the merchant experience
As a 14-year veteran in the MCA space, Whitestone Fund could leverage AI underwriting to scale funding volume without proportionally scaling headcount
ask: Adelso, with your 95% acceptance rate and 14 years of MCA experience, I'd love to show you how AI underwriting could help you maintain that approval rate while tightening risk management — would you have 15 minutes this week?
notes: Long-established MCA funder since 2010. Multiple web domains (whitestonefund.com, whitestonecash.com, fund.whitestonefund.com). Yelp listing shows 5030 Broadway location as CLOSED, but BBB profile shows Yonkers address as active. Focuses on small-to-mid-size businesses. Key selling angle: help them scale beyond current capacity with AI while maintaining their high acceptance rate.

name: WiseSide Incorporated
desc:
WiseSide Incorporated is a full-service financial company founded in September 2020, headquartered in New York, NY. Co-founded by Nakel Nikiema, the company provides tailored business financing, comprehensive life insurance solutions, and full-spectrum property and casualty protection. WiseSide offers alternative business lending opportunities for startups and existing businesses, including long-term loans, SBA loans, and equipment financing.

The company works with many lenders and specializes in helping clients with credit challenges, licensed to serve clients in all 50 US states. WiseSide has a strong focus on the African diaspora community in the United States while maintaining services open to all. Nakel Nikiema, the Co-Founder and Chairman, was recognized as Top Co-Founder and Financial Consultant of the Year by IAOTP, bringing over 20 years of program management expertise to the company.

leaders.bg: Program Management Expert with over 20 years of experience. Co-founded WiseSide Inc. in 2020. Recognized as Top Co-Founder and Financial Consultant of the Year by IAOTP. Focuses on empowering entrepreneurs through access to capital and holistic insurance coverage, with a strong emphasis on serving the African diaspora community.
hooks: Congratulations on being recognized as Top Co-Founder and Financial Consultant by IAOTP — well deserved
Your dual approach of business financing plus insurance protection is a unique value proposition in the market
Serving clients with credit challenges across all 50 states requires sophisticated risk assessment
Your focus on empowering the African diaspora entrepreneur community fills an important market gap

news.d: WiseSide Inc.'s co-founder Nakel Nikiema was recognized by the International Association of Top Professionals for his expertise in consulting services and financial leadership.

news.d: In-depth interview with WiseSide Inc.'s co-founder covering his journey from program management to building an integrated financial services company.

news.d: WiseSide Inc.'s chairman received industry recognition for his consulting expertise and contributions to the financial services sector.

Niche focus on African diaspora community but serves all. Sells through broker/lender network. Key angle: AI can help them scale lending while managing the inherently riskier credit-challenged borrower segment.

name: Working Capital Solution
desc:
Working Capital Solution is a small business funder operating in the merchant cash advance and alternative lending space. Limited public information is available about this specific entity. The company appears to operate as a direct funder or broker providing working capital solutions to small and medium-sized businesses, consistent with the broader MCA industry where companies offer advances against future business revenues.

The working capital funding space has seen significant growth, with the small business lending market expected to grow at 13% CAGR through 2032. Companies in this segment typically provide funding from $5,000 to $5 million with rapid approval and disbursement processes, often within 24-48 hours.

news.h: Small Business Lending Market Expected to Reach $7.22 Trillion by 2032
news.d: The global small business lending market is projected to grow at a 13% CAGR, driven by digital lending solutions and alternative financing providers.

name: WOTR Enterprise LLC
desc:
WOTR Enterprise LLC is an alternative business financing company headquartered in Central Islip, NY, led by CEO Edward Ramirez. The company specializes in providing Merchant Cash Advances (MCAs), Lines of Credit, Equipment Financing, Term Loans, and Consolidation services. WOTR emphasizes credit-friendly financing that welcomes all credit types, with a Quick Yes Approval process designed for fast, hassle-free funding.

In June 2024, WOTR Enterprise announced a significant expansion of services to meet growing demand for alternative financing options. The company accommodates clients without extra fees and applies discounts as an early repayment incentive. Their team of experienced financial experts provides businesses with tools and strategies to improve their financial health, positioning WOTR as a full-service alternative to traditional banking institutions.

leaders.bg: CEO of WOTR Enterprise LLC, leading the company's expansion into alternative financing. In June 2024, announced a major service expansion to meet growing demand for MCAs, Lines of Credit, Equipment Financing, and Term Loans. Focuses on providing flexible, accessible financing solutions for businesses of all sizes and industries.
hooks: Your June 2024 service expansion shows strong growth — how has demand responded since the announcement?
The Quick Yes Approval process is a great differentiator — what's your typical approval-to-funding timeline?
Your no-extra-fees approach with early repayment discounts builds trust with merchants
Welcoming all credit types requires sophisticated risk assessment — how do you manage that?

news.h: WOTR Enterprise Expands Services to Meet Growing Demand for Alternative Financing Options
news.d: WOTR Enterprise LLC announced a major expansion of their financial services portfolio including MCAs, Lines of Credit, Equipment Financing, Term Loans, and Consolidation to address growing demand from small and medium businesses.

news.d: The company's service expansion received coverage across multiple national media outlets, highlighting the growing demand for alternative financing options.

Central Islip, NY base suggests Long Island operations. Priority 7 (higher priority in this batch). name: Creditfy, LLC d/b/a Creditfy
desc:
Creditfy, LLC is a New York-based business financing company founded on December 3, 2020. The company is a leading provider of business financing across the US, offering a comprehensive suite of commercial financing solutions including business lines of credit, equipment financing, business term loans, invoice financing, bridge loans, and SBA loans. Creditfy can fund up to $5M with disbursement in as little as 24 hours.

The company reports an 82% approval rate with competitive terms — interest rates starting at 1.06% monthly and rates as low as 5.6%. Minimum requirements include a 600 personal credit score and $180,000 in annual revenue, though startup equipment loans accept 550+ credit scores with 6 months in business. Creditfy is BBB Accredited and has received consistently positive reviews on Trustpilot and BestCompany. The company has an estimated 11-50 employees and is led by Co-Founder & CEO Lawrence Crawford.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Creditfy in 2020 and has built the company into a leading multi-product business financing provider. Under his leadership, Creditfy has achieved an 82% approval rate and expanded into a full suite of commercial financing products including SBA loans, equipment financing, and business lines of credit.
hooks: Building a multi-product lending platform since 2020 shows impressive execution speed
Your 82% approval rate suggests strong underwriting — how do you balance approval volume with risk?
Offering SBA loans alongside MCAs and equipment financing gives you a broad product moat
Your consistently positive customer reviews on Trustpilot speak to a strong operational culture

leaders.bg: Leads sales operations at Creditfy, driving growth across the company's diverse product portfolio of business financing solutions. Works to connect small businesses with the right financing products from Creditfy's comprehensive suite.
hooks: How is the sales team managing conversations across such a diverse product lineup?
With funding up to $5M and SBA loans, your sales team must handle a wide range of deal sizes

news.d: Creditfy continues its BBB Accredited status as a business loans provider in New York, demonstrating commitment to consumer trust.

Strong Trustpilot reviews with repeat customers. 11-50 employees per ZoomInfo. Key angle: AI can help them manage complexity of multi-product underwriting while scaling.

name: Loanability, Inc.
desc:
Loanability, Inc. was founded in October 2007 and is headquartered in Jenkintown, Pennsylvania. The company was created to provide a streamlined and responsive alternative to traditional small business financing and has provided funding to thousands of small businesses across all 50 states. Initially focused exclusively on retailers accepting credit cards at the point of sale, Loanability has since expanded to fund nearly every business type, including those that do not accept credit cards.

Led by President Brad Myers, Loanability has become an industry leader in small business financing through its simple funding process and focus on outstanding customer service. The company employs a unique pricing model based on economies of scale, offering the best possible terms on working capital rather than maximizing profit on each individual loan. Their simple process allows them to fund most loans in one day, with flexible underwriting that approves most applications, offering longer terms and competitive rates for every credit grade. The company maintains a BBB Business Profile in Willow Grove, PA.

leaders.bg: President of Loanability since the company's founding in 2007. Has led the company through multiple economic cycles including the 2008 financial crisis and COVID-19, growing it from a credit-card-only MCA provider to a full-spectrum small business funder serving all 50 states with same-day funding capabilities.
hooks: 17+ years in small business financing through multiple economic cycles is remarkable staying power
Your volume-based pricing model is unique in the industry — how has that approach evolved over time?
Expanding from credit card retailers to all business types shows strong product evolution
Same-day funding with flexible underwriting across all credit grades is a compelling offer

news.h: Loanability Continues to Expand Small Business Lending Across All 50 States
news.d: Loanability maintains its national footprint, offering lines of credit, business loans, and receivables funding across healthcare, construction, retail, and other industries.

news.h: Small Business Lending Industry Sees Strong Growth
news.d: The SBA approved over 70,000 loans totaling $31.1B in 2024, a 22% increase in approvals, benefiting established alternative lenders like Loanability.

ice: Loanability's 17+ year track record of funding thousands of businesses through every economic cycle since 2007 speaks to the strength of your underwriting model.
icebreakers: Your volume-based pricing philosophy — funding more deals at better rates rather than maximizing per-deal profit — is refreshingly merchant-friendly
From credit card retailers in 2007 to serving all business types across 50 states today shows impressive evolution
Same-day funding with flexible underwriting across all credit grades is a competitive advantage worth protecting with better technology
17 years of small business lending through every economic cycle gives you data and expertise that's hard to replicate

With 17 years of lending data, Loanability's underwriting models could be supercharged with AI to identify patterns across all business types and credit grades
As Loanability's volume-based pricing model depends on scale, AI-powered underwriting could help process more applications without proportionally increasing headcount
ask: Brad, Loanability's 17-year track record of same-day funding across all 50 states is impressive — I'd love to discuss how AI underwriting could help you process even more volume while maintaining the quality your merchants expect. Would you have 15 minutes?
notes: Well-established funder since 2007. Unique volume-based pricing model. Serves all 50 states across multiple industries. Same-day funding capability. BBB profiled in Willow Grove, PA. Expanded from credit-card-only to all business types. Key angle: AI can help them scale their volume-based model even further while maintaining underwriting quality.

name: Reliable Capital Advance LLC
desc:
Reliable Capital Advance LLC is an alternative business funder established on January 22, 2025, and registered as a Foreign Limited Liability Company in New York. Based in Monsey, NY, the company is dedicated to providing fast, flexible, and transparent funding for companies of all sizes. Reliable Capital operates as a direct funder offering personalized, scalable capital without prepayment penalties, hidden fees, or burdensome collateral stipulations.

The company differentiates itself through its merchant-friendly approach, emphasizing transparency and flexibility in its funding terms. As a newer entrant to the alternative business funding market, Reliable Capital is positioning itself to serve businesses that need quick access to working capital without the constraints of traditional lending. The company maintains profiles on BBB, LinkedIn, and Yelp in New York City.
full_address: 25 Robert Pitt Drive, Suite 204, Monsey, NY 10952

name: SECURE CAPITAL SOLUTIONS INC.
desc:
Secure Capital Solutions Inc. is a small business loans and financing company founded on May 26, 2020, and headquartered in Deal, New Jersey. The company operates as a direct funder offering lines of credit, term loans, and working capital advances, tailored to meet client needs without impacting credit scores. Led by President Jacob Saada (also known as Jay Saada), the company provides same-day financing with a high approval rate through exclusive funding options.

Secure Capital Solutions offers collateral-free working capital advances with less paperwork and quicker processing than traditional bank credit. The company has earned positive Trustpilot reviews (10+ reviews) with customers praising the speed, flexibility, and personal service. The company is BBB profiled and maintains an active presence on LinkedIn, emphasizing their commitment to putting clients over profits.

leaders.bg: Founder and President of Secure Capital Solutions Inc., established in May 2020 in Deal, NJ. Has built the company into a direct funder with positive Trustpilot reviews and BBB profile, emphasizing same-day financing and collateral-free working capital advances with a client-first approach.

Same-day financing with collateral-free advances is a strong value proposition
Building from Deal, NJ — the Shore community has become a real hub for alternative lending

name: X CAPITAL GROUP CORP.
desc:
X Capital Group Corp. is a private, family-owned business established in 2024, headquartered in Cedarhurst, NY. The company offers revenue-based financing with customized funding offers ranging from $10,000 to $5 million, with payback terms from 30 days to 2 years. X Capital Group utilizes a team of human underwriters to evaluate applications and prides itself on having one of the fastest fund distribution times in the industry, typically delivering within 12 hours of approval.

The company operates as a broker-funder hybrid, connecting small business owners with premium funding institutions through their platform while also providing direct funding. Revenue-based financing from X Capital can be used for equipment purchases, inventory restocking, payroll, commercial real estate, business expansion, and working capital needs. As a newer entrant to the market, the company is building its reputation on speed and personalized service.

Uses human underwriters. Up to $5M funding. Key angle: as a new, speed-focused funder, AI underwriting is a natural fit for their growth.

name: Labo Capital
desc:
Labo Capital is a small business financing company based in Bradenton, Florida, with over 15 years of experience in the industry. Founded by William Labovic and led by CEO Peter Ribeiro, the company provides fast, flexible funding for small businesses including working capital loans ($50,000 to $5,000,000), equipment financing ($50,000 to $50,000,000), and lines of credit. The company offers same-day approval and funding, with flexible terms ranging from 6 months to 7 years for well-qualified borrowers.

Labo Capital positions itself as a white-glove service provider, with a team of dedicated financial experts who work closely with each client. The company offers creative financing solutions including EFA, $1 Out, FMV, Trac & Split Leases, Floor Plan Lines, and Rental Fleet Facilities. Equipment financing may be eligible for tax deductions under Section 179 of the tax code. The company maintains active profiles on LinkedIn and Alignable.

leaders.bg: CEO of Labo Capital, leading the company's small business financing operations. Oversees the delivery of working capital, equipment financing, and lines of credit to small businesses with a white-glove service approach, leveraging 15+ years of industry experience.
